title: Internship Completion Certificate
description:
Successfully completed Embedded Systems Internship at Revoh Innovations Pvt Ltd, Chennai, from 24th July 2025 to 29th August 2025.

Demonstrated strong work ethic, quick grasp of technical concepts, and a proactive approach to learning. Showed remarkable ability to solve complex problems and collaborated effectively with senior engineers on key projects. Contributions to the team were valuable, and all responsibilities assigned were successfully fulfilled.

Recognized for skills in embedded systems, which will be a great asset to any future team.
